member_organisations: AccorHotels, Carlson Rezidor, Nordic Choice, CitizenM, Hilton Worldwide, Hyatt, IHG, Marriott International, Wyndham
fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Competition, Consumers, Single market, Digital economy and society

- Tourism policy 
- Competition policy 
- Consumer protection 
- Single Market 
- Digital Single Market
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
commission_expert_groups_and_other_simil: Stakeholder consultation group for the Fitness Check of EU consumer and marketing law #E03423#http://ec.europa.eu/transparency/regexpert/index.cfm?do=groupDetail.groupDetail&groupID=3423#Member#C
relevant_communication:
- Meeting with institutional officials on policy issues of relevance to the European hotel and tourism industry

- Participate in public events
goals__remit: The European Hotel Forum is founded as a pan-European forum to research hospitality-related issues and take action on them as appropriate through legislative, policy, media and hotel industry educational venues.
